Review.Titre: The work was not done at the time of…
Review.Contenu: The work was not done at the time of the appointment.  We were just given a quote and were charged for this.

Review.Titre: Nothing wrong with the work but the tec…
Review.Contenu: Nothing wrong with the work but the tec took pictures of things he though should be fixed but no one sent me the pics.
We own our own high liability business & are not naive to costs. However, we will not call BEST again after the charges incurred for a very simple service.

While fixing an on/off handle in my sprinkler system they broke the pipe attached to the new handle. Them wanted to charge me $800 to get that pipe fixed. The original work was less than half that price.

After multiple visits, $1400, cameras being run into vents and no answers we decided we would just replace duct system under house as air not reaching back of house. No clogs or obstacles were seen however we do have several vents taped up to stay in place. We were told 2 weeks we would have estimate. It has now been months and no estimate, no reply back, no answers and winter is knocking at the door. Used to be a top notch company so very disappointed and not quite sure why unable to get an estimate to replace duct work.

Review.Titre: Was not impressed with the whole…
Review.Contenu: Was not impressed with the whole process. Felt like it could have been handled better.

Review.Titre: Work that was done was very good
Review.Contenu: Work that was done was very good. However, prices were absurdly high. I could've hired other professional plumbers at a substantial savings. Plus I had to argue to prove that a defective ball valve/shut off valve was actually from previous work you had done less than six months earlier.

Review.Titre: The work they do is very good they are…
Review.Contenu: The work they do is very good they are just getting really pricey for it.

They were very knowledgeable and helpful with everything. I requested that they come out to service my A/C unit. It's an old A/C unit but works well. Additionally, they gave me a quote on a new A//C unit and heater system. It's not cheap but they did show me several payment options. My only issue is the fact that they charge a service call charge, then the A/C unit service charge and then a charge for driving to my house which is 19 miles from their office in Sydney. The total charge to service my A/C was $347. After calling a few other companies, two of which were in Scottsbluff, NE. Which is much further away and their quotes were less. And they don't charge to drive out.
Bodhi had wonderful customer service. They were timely, explained things well, and fixed our problem quickly!
Your technician’s are great men. They do their job and do it right. Thank you so much for your awesome service.
Hayden did an excellent job taking care of my property and communicated in a timely fashion. I felt that I was his top priority and would use him again!!

These people are fabulous!  I have never had quite the experience with another vendor that I've had with Best.  They are on the job immediately with whatever request I have made immediately, or at least as soon after, as humanly possible.  They are, without doubt, the most courteous, helpful and willing professionals I've dealt with.  Their work is timely, calls are returned right away and the work they have done for me is impeccable.

Review.Titre: The new part was faulty - I was really disappointed
Review.Contenu: Well, it worked fine the first winter after installation of the thermostat.  My complaint is that. While it took me 2 years to pay off my bill (which I really appreciate), the new thermostat only worked for the first winter after installation, so this past (second year) winter I froze until I could save enough money to buy a room-size stand-a-lone space heater to heat my room.
Great service, knowledgeable and very nice technician, work done in a timely and efficient manner. We are a totally satisfied customer!
Fred was very professional and knowledgeable about our AC unit. He was able to provide same day repairs. We highly recommend Best Plumbing and Cooling.
Best Plumbing always stands behind their work! I highly recommend them!

I got a fast and courteous response to my problem even considering the terrible weather.  The repair was made quickly, and accurately and the service techs were very courteous and neat. No mess left behind.

Review.Titre: Best Plumbing was very responsive and…
Review.Contenu: Best Plumbing was very responsive and able to fix an air conditioning problem on a very hot day.
Quick response always. Friendly, knowledgeable employees, customer service telephone people, plumbing and hvac expertise! We've used Best 3 times recently and will continue to do so!!!

Review.Titre: The worker knew right away where all…
Review.Contenu: The worker knew right away where all the problems were. He seemed very knowledgeable and efficient.
Service crew were on time and completed the job in a timely manner.
Was very pleased.  People very pleasant and work very satisfactory.

Review.Titre: The professionalism of the Johnny and…
Review.Contenu: The professionalism of the Johnny and his crew.  Could not be happier.
The technician was amazing. Thank you
The worker knew what he was doing and got the work done in good time.

Review.Titre: Good and timely response but very…
Review.Contenu: Good and timely response but very expensive!
They do what they say, give options, and follow through
Great service, quick response time!
Thank you for helping us out in the emergency.

Review.Titre: Showed up on time fixed the problem

Review.Contenu: Qualified and professional technicians.  Good company communications.  Quality and timely service.

Review.Titre: Found the problem and fixed it.
